awards:
第8届罗马电影节(2013)
　　最佳影片(提名) 阿尔伯托·法苏洛

writer.name: 阿尔伯托·法苏洛 Alberto Fasulo

director.name: 阿尔伯托·法苏洛 Alberto Fasulo

introduction: Branko has been a truck driver for only a few months, a choice that is quite understandable, given that he now earns three times as much as he did as a schoolteacher. But everything has a price, which is not always quantifiable in terms of money. As children we were told: “work ennobles man”. But here the opposite seems true: it is Branko, with his efficiency, his obstinacy, his good will, who ennobles a job that grows more and more alienating, absurd and enslaving.
